response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering the product's unique features and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality solution at a price that is just above its perceived value to you. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 9500}
